topics.body:
Speaking of, I haven't shit-talked Sword Art Online recently. I feel like I'm overdue.

Sword Art Online is the worst written and most creatively bankrupt anime in recent history filled with bad characters and an uninteresting plot. It's very very bad and you shouldn't watch it.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@Virgil Stormblade":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559dcda26368720ed5000d7e#post_559dcda26368720ed5000d7e
If by that you mean a piece of shit that ruins every thing by it's mere existence, yes.


"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559dcda36368726788001086#post_559dcda36368726788001086
Juane is constantly shilled by the best fighter for his great potential, which she unlocks for him instead of him actually working at it, the narrative is always on his side, and he randomly gains new competence to achieve goals, petty humor does not cover these facts up, my hope is that he will get Someone killed and be exposed cozing the headmaster to be replaced for his blatant incompetence and we will see the consequences of a moron lying his way into a military program because he feels entitled to a chance he didn't fucking earn,
topics.author: 509f70a87f123b77eb0004fd
